item.title: Iran Is at Work on Missile and Nuclear Sites, Satellite Images Show

item.title: Trump Shares Video Portraying the Obamas as Apes
item.description: The White House press secretary dismissed criticism of the clip’s racist content, shared by the president’s Truth Social account, as “fake outrage.”

item.title: Latest U.S. Boat Strike Kills 2 in Pacific
item.description: The operation was authorized by the Marine general who took command of military operations in Latin America and the Caribbean earlier in the day.
